price: Enti (Mose) su frεε ne Wura Nyankopͻn sε: “Saa nkorͻfoͻ yi yε nnipa bͻnefoͻ”.
arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fadaʿā rabbahu anna hāulāi qawmun muj'rimūna
